EXTRACTED VALUE: Nearly every aspect of Eragon is a disappointment, from its straight-outta-the-current-gen graphics to its poor in-game camera.
With very little progress since the last Narnia, even huge fans will want a price cut. [Sept 2008, p.83]
To say that Over G Fighters is a phenomenally terrible game isn't an exaggeration or a quippy joke. [Sept. 2006, p.97]
Could have been much better, unfortunately though this game has far too many flaws for us to recommend it to anyone.
We were pleasantly surprised by Crash. The ability to take over creatures lifts the standard linear platforming from banality. [Issue 26, p.97]
Marginally superior to the original but too many rough edges remain. [Nov 2007, p.85]
Online play is the only redeemable feature of this 'update.' Get "Puzzle Quest" instead. That got three stars. [Christmas 2007, p.98]
